text: The Hiligaynon people (Hiligaynon: "mga Ilonggo") is one of the vast ethnic group in the Visayas in central Philippines, It is particularly located in Western Visayas, The Iloilo province is mainly used the Hiligaynon some parts provinces of Guimaras, Negros Occidental; Mindanao in Cotabato, South Cotabato and Sultan Kudarat.https://dbpedia.org/page/Hiligaynon_people It is close similar to Kinaray-a people and the Capiznon people situated in Western Visayas or Region 6. ==Reference== Category:Ethnic groups in the Philippines
title: Hiligaynon people
